address_id.description: Unique identifier for the address associated with the charge

id.description: Unique identifier of the billing address

address1.description: First line of the billing address

address2.description: Second line of the billing address

cart_note.description: Note related to billing address for cart

company.description: Company name associated with the billing address

created_at.description: Date and time when billing address was created

discount_id.description: Unique identifier of discount applied to the billing address

first_name.description: First name on the billing address

last_name.description: Last name on the billing address

province.description: Province or state of the billing address

shipping_lines_override.description: Override for shipping lines associated with the billing address

updated_at.description: Date and time when billing address was last updated

zip.description: Zip or postal code of the billing address

client_details.description: Details of the client associated with the charge

created_at.description: Date and time when the charge was created

discount_codes.description: Codes of discounts applied to the charge

email.description: Email address associated with the charge

error.description: Error message related to the charge

first_name.description: First name associated with the charge

last_name.description: Last name associated with the charge

last_charge_attempt_date.description: Date and time of the last charge attempt

has_uncommited_changes.description: Flag indicating if there are uncommitted changes

note_attributes.description: Additional notes or attributes related to the charge

processed_at.description: Date and time when the charge was processed

processor_name.description: Name of the processor handling the charge

retry_date.description: Date and time set for retrying the charge

scheduled_at.description: Date and time scheduled for the charge

shipments_count.description: Count of shipments associated with the charge

address1.description: First line of the shipping address
